div.a: The Anatomy Of A Heroin Ring

div.div: Dana Bostic's gang-affiliated west-side drug organization employed dozens of residents, served thousands of customers, established ties with Mexican drug cartels, and relied on violence to stay in business.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YYhhI0&via=Digg&text=The Anatomy Of A Heroin Ring

div.a: 5 Amazing Fireballs Caught On Video

div.div: A meteor broke apart and exploded over Russia's Ural Mountains this morning, injuring hundreds and breaking windows. This might be the most recent fireball to enter the atmosphere, but it's certainly not the first.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12LnxDh&via=Digg&text=5 Amazing Fireballs Caught On Video

div.a: This Morning's Google Doodle You Weren't Meant To See

div.div: Google, topical as always, prepared one of its famed doodles in celebration of today's passing asteroid. The Google Doodle team, however, couldn't have anticipated how unfortunately relevant they actually would be following the unexpected meteor explosion over Russia.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15isqrx&via=Digg&text=This Morning's Google Doodle You Weren't Meant To See

div.a: The European Trade In Horsemeat Mapped

div.div: More than 60,000 tonnes of horsemeat was traded by European countries in 2012. This data, from the Eurostat internal trade database shows exports of Equidae over the year - that is, 'horse-like' animals, such as horses, donkeys, mules and asses.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XbU9Wa&via=Digg&text=The European Trade In Horsemeat Mapped

div.a: What's The Difference Between An Asteroid, A Meteor And A Meteorite?

div.div: The terms asteroid, meteor, meteorite and meteoroid get tossed around recklessly, especially when two of them threaten the Earth on the same day. Here's a quick explainer.

div.a: The Village Where Women Chose To Be Single Mothers

div.div: They had no plan to break barriers or cause trouble. But 30 years ago in this bucolic village in northern Vietnam, the fierce determination of one group of women upended centuries-old gender rules and helped a nation redefine parenthood.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYF0Wb&via=Digg&text=The Village Where Women Chose To Be Single Mothers

div.a: Russian Meteor Captured On Camera

div.div: At about 09:30 local time, a very big meteor burned up over Chelyabinsk, a city in Russia just east of the Ural mountains. The sonic boom shattered windows, and debris has injured dozens of people.

div.a: The Mayor With The Billion Dollar Gambling Problem

div.div: A former mayor of San Diego spent the last decade wagering more than a billion dollars at casinos across the country, eventually liquidating her savings, auctioning her belongings, selling off real estate, borrowing from friends and taking more than $2 million from a charity set up by her late husband.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XClvlR&via=Digg&text=The Mayor With The Billion Dollar Gambling Problem
